name: atomic-crm
description: Atomic CRM is a lightweight customer relationship manager built on React Admin. It allows companies to centralize customer data, track interactions, and support automation workflows with an open-source backend.
features: Customer Management: Centralize all customer data and interactions. Complete CRM.
Interaction Tracking: Log calls, emails, and meetings automatically. Never miss details.
React Admin: Built on modern React Admin framework. Powerful interface.
Workflow Automation: Automate repetitive CRM tasks. Save time.
Contact Database: Organize customers with detailed profiles. Know your clients.
Sales Pipeline: Track deals from lead to close. Visualize progress.
Open Source: Customize to fit your business needs. Flexible platform.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over customer data. Privacy guaranteed.
